attributes.action: Deport Muslim activists and support our troops
attributes.additional_details:
With the atrocities of yesterdays Muslim attack on a member of the HM Forces whilst off-duty in Woolwich it is now time to take strong action.

With scenes not seen since Howes and Woods in Northern Ireland the country is up in arms and now demand action.

Sharia law states if you kill anyone the penalty is death. If the Government are not strong the UK will be forced to take verbal action. Deport these people NOW
